text: My Younger Brother () is a 1962 Soviet drama film directed by Aleksandr Zarkhi.Евгений Харитонов: биография, пласт первый — тела театровСергей Собянин поздравил Александра Збруева с днем рождения == Plot == The film tells about four friends who, after passing the final exams, decided to go to the Baltic States to feel like adults, and even the attempt of the brother of one of them to dissuade them does not stop them.Мой младший брат == Cast == * Lyudmila Marchenko as Galya * Aleksandr ZbruevСобянин поздравил Александра Збруева с днем рождения as Dima Denisov * Oleg Dahl as Alik * Andrei MironovАндрей Миронов: "Надо стараться делать всё хорошо, а плохо оно само получится" as Yurka * Oleg Efremov as Viktor Denisov * Ivan Savkin * Arvo Kruusement * Jaan Saul as Endel (as Ya. Saul) * Sergei Kurilov as Innokentiy Petrov (as S. Kurilov) * Villu Tomingas as Gustav (as V. Tomingas)Мой младший брат (1962) Full Cast & Crew == References == == External links == * Category:1962 films Category:Russian-language films Category:Soviet drama films Category:Soviet films
title: My Younger Brother
